Jeanete Leicht

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3765412223140196
  • Última atualização do currículo em 06/03/2008

Possui graduação em Engenharia Eletrica pela Universidade para o Desenvolvimento do Estado de Santa Catarina(1988), especialização em Engenharia de Producao pelo Fundação Universidade Regional de Blumenau(1992), mestrado em Educação pelo Fundação Universidade Regional de Blumenau(1997) e doutorado em PhD pela University of Wales(2003). Tem experiência na área de Engenharia Elétrica. Atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas:PWM, complex magnetisation, measurements, prediction. (Texto gerado automaticamente pela aplicação CVLattes)

Orientador: Anthony John Moses.

Artigos completos publicados em periódicos

LEICHT, J.2008LEICHT, J.; N.A. Castro ; E.C. Silva ; F.J.G. Landgraf ; A.J. Moses ; T. Yonamine . Magnetic properties of 6.5% silicon content under sine and PWM excitation. Journal of Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, v. 2, p. 156, 2008.

2.
MOSES, A. J.2006MOSES, A. J. ; LEICHT, J. ; ANDERSON, P. . Apparent permeability of electrical steel under PWM magnetisation. Journal of Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, v. 304, p. 139-242, 2006.

3.
LEICHT, J.2005LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A. J. ; D.Fox . Influence of geometry and wave shape on magnetic amorphous material. Journal of Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Holanda, v. 291, p. 1520-1523, 2005.

4.
LEICHT, J.2005 LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A. J. . Iron loss prediction under pulse width modulated conditions. Journal of Applied Physics, New York, v. 97, 2005.

5.
LEICHT, J.2004LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A. J. . Iron loss prediction under sinusoidal and non-sinusoidal excitation using a neural network approach. Soft Magnetic Material 16, Verlag Stahleisen, Dusseldorf, v. 01, p. 329-334, 2004.

6.
LEICHT, J.2003LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A. J. ; ANDERSON, P. . Characterising electrical steels under complex magnetisation conditions. Journal of Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, NH, v. 254, p. 54-56, 2003.

7.
LEICHT, J.2002 LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A. J. . Measurement and effects on non-sinusoidal flux waveforms in electrical steels. Journal of Electrical Engineering, Bratislavia, v. 53, n.10, p. 65-68, 2002.

8.
LEICHT, J.2001LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A.J. . Power Loss of non oriented electrical steel under square wave excitation. IEEE Transactions on Magnetics, v. 37, n.04, p. 2737-2739, 2001.

Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A.J. . Iron Loss Prediction under PWM conditions based on loss measured under sinusoidal magnetisation. In: Magnetic Measurements and Standards One-day seminar, 2004, Cardiff. The U.K. Magnetics Society. Oxfordshire: The UK Magnetics Society, 2004.

2.
LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A.J. ; ANAYI, F. . Analysis of magnetic properties of electrical steel in stator core of inverter fed motors. Berlin: Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt Braunschweig, 2002. v. 81. p. 37-45.

In: Seventh International Workshop on 1&2 Dimensional Magnetic Measurement and Testing, 2003, Ludenscheid. PTB-E-81 Report Seires of the Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt Braunschweig. Berlin: Physikalisch-Technische Bundesanstalt Braunschweig, 2002. v. 81. p. 181-185.

4.
LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A.J. . Some effects of PWM and other waveform parameters on losses in electrical steels. In: Soft Magnetic Materials: The influence of Operation Conditions on their performance in transformes and motors, 2002, Newport. The U.K. Magnetics Society. Oxfordshire: The U.K. Magnetics Society, 2002.

5.
LEICHT, J.; MOSES, A.J. . Iron losses in electrical machine excited by non-sinusoidal voltages. In: International Conference on Power Electronics, Machines and Drives, 2002, Bath. Power Electronics, Machines and Drives. London: Institution of ElectricalEngineers - IEE, 2002. v. 487. p. 252-254.

6.
LEICHT, J.; HALL, J. ; ANDERSON, P. ; MOSES, A.J. . Non-standard magnetic measurements under controlled conditions. In: UKMAG One-day Seminar: Instrumentation for Magnetic Measurements, 2000, Warwick. UKMAG. Oxfordshire: The U.K. Magnetics Society, 2000.
